SL
RP

Make taste fun

We think that the experience of taste and atmosphere is closely linked. Fun evenings makes for fun taste.

Features

Slurp comes packed with potential for memories with friends and family. It takes the best parts of beertasting and adds its own innovations.

  • Compose your own tastesession

    You decide the theme for your session. Choose what beers you are tasting, and what parameters you are messuring by.

  • Fits for every party

    After the session is made, you can invite as many as you like by sharing the pin. There's no limit on how many tasters that can join you in your adventure.

  • Scoring by FaceDice

    You will be scoring every beer by your own selected parameters, but in addition you get to score the beer with your face.

  • Find the favourite

    When the session is done you get a highscore of all beers tasted.

  • Collage of taste

    You get a collage of all the FaceDice's from the best and worst beer in the tastesession.

  • More features coming

    There will be many more exciting features coming soon.

Get in touch

If you experience issues don't hesitate to contact us. We appreciate feedback so we can improve our app.
